long_description: The Victorinox Travel Organizer holds your important documents to keep them safe. It features a large stash pocket and full-length zip pocket to store tickets, a passport and most sizes of currency. Zippered pocket for coins; dedicated card slots and micro-mesh ID slot.
short_description: The Victorinox Travel Organizer holds your important documents to keep them safe. It features a large stash pocket and full-length zip pocket to store tickets, a passport and most sizes of currency.
